1141.title: Orca

info.brief_description: You land in a world of Furs where it's your job to be eaten by them in lots of ways.
info.description:
You land in a world of Furs where it's your job to be eaten by and service them in lots of ways.

Rules:
~The main character can be human or a fur.
~All other characters are furs.
~All types of vore is allowed.
~I'm going to allow pretty much every type of fur except for Primates and Insects. Dragons, Scalies etc etc are all allowed.
~Please try and keep the story going. There is no death. However if the main character is digested then he/she will just reform.
~The job pays on what the pred wants. For example if the pred wants to simply oral vore that character then that's cheaper then if the Pred wants to digest the main character.
~Paw service is allowed as well.
~If the Pred (Buyer) is female then She may use the main character as a toy. Same goes for a male if he wants that :P
~Try and use proper grammar.
~One Paragraph minimum please.
~Points for good additions!
~Other than that there's nothing else to say.
